assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors have no conflicts of interest to declare that are relevant to the content of this article.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This research study was conducted retrospectively from data obtained for clinical purposes. This study was reviewed and approved by both the University of British Columbia/BC Cancer Research Ethics Board and Human Research Ethics Board of the University of Fraser Valley.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This research study was conducted retrospectively from data obtained for clinical purposes. Individual consent was not collected.
